allow:
Bash(HUSKY=0 git commit -m "fix: update NewsPanel to handle new API response structure

Updated NewsPanel component to properly handle the new API endpoints structure where news data is returned as an object with a ''news'' array property instead of a direct array. The component now supports both formats for backward compatibility.")

Bash(HUSKY=0 git commit -m "feat: remove Media page and associated code

- Removed Media.tsx page component
- Removed Media route from App.tsx routing configuration
- Removed Media navigation link and Image icon import from Navigation component
- Removed unused Video, Image types and their response interfaces from api.ts
- All references to Media page have been cleaned up")

Bash(HUSKY=0 git commit -m "refactor: simplify GameTrailer to use YouTube URL directly from videos endpoint

- Removed TrailerData interface as it''s no longer needed
- Updated component to use intro video''s url field directly
- Removed unnecessary cloudinaryUrl and localUrl handling
- Kept the YouTube embed URL helper function for iframe embedding")
